services.title: Services
services.service-1-description: Professional IT system development services, including enterprise management systems and business process systems, ensuring high performance and reliability.
services.service-2-description: Development of secure and convenient electronic payment systems, supporting multiple payment methods to meet various payment scenarios.
services.service-3-description: Professional cross-border settlement solutions, helping businesses achieve secure and efficient cross-border fund transfers.
services.service-4-description: Comprehensive technical support and services for religious organizations, including website development, event management, and member services.
services.service-5-description: Professional technical consulting services to help you make informed technology decisions.
services.service-6-description: Comprehensive technical support and maintenance services to ensure your systems run smoothly and continuously.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: Be part of our journey to excellence
careers.item-description-1: Responsible for daily administrative tasks, supporting various departments to ensure smooth company operations. Requirements: Fluent in Chinese, Japanese, and English, 2+ years of administrative experience, proficient in office software, excellent communication skills.
careers.item-description-2: Responsible for product user experience design, creating intuitive, beautiful, and user-friendly interfaces. Requirements: 3+ years of UI/UX design experience, proficient in Figma, strong design aesthetics, team collaboration skills.
